mapper.select: SELECT TD.id , TD.door_nm , TD.door_cd , TD.floor_cd , TD.building_cd , TD.building_id , TD.area_id , TD.floor_id , TD.alarm_typ -- , TDD.doorgrp_id , TSD.id AS sch_doorgrp_id , TSD.nm AS sch_doorgrp_nm , TDS.id as sch_id , TDS.door_sch_nm as sch_nm , (SELECT GROUP_CONCAT( TT.id SEPARATOR '/') FROM T_TERMINAL TT WHERE TT.door_id= TD.id ) AS terminal_id , (SELECT GROUP_CONCAT( TT.terminal_cd SEPARATOR '/') FROM T_TERMINAL TT WHERE TT.door_id= TD.id ) AS terminal_cd , (SELECT GROUP_CONCAT( TT.mgmt_num SEPARATOR '/') FROM T_TERMINAL TT WHERE TT.door_id= TD.id ) AS mgmt_num , (SELECT GROUP_CONCAT( TT.auth_id SEPARATOR '/') FROM T_AUTH_DOOR TT WHERE TT.door_id= TD.id ) AS auth_ids , (SELECT GROUP_CONCAT( (SELECT TA.auth_nm FROM T_AUTH TA WHERE TA.id = TT.auth_id) SEPARATOR '/') FROM T_AUTH_DOOR TT WHERE TT.door_id =TD.id ) AS auth_nms FROM T_DOOR TD LEFT OUTER JOIN T_SCH_DOORGRP TSD ON TSD.id = TD.sch_doorgrp_id LEFT OUTER JOIN T_DOOR_SCH TDS ON TSD.door_sch_id = TDS.id WHERE TD.id = #{id} GROUP BY TD.id
mapper.update: UPDATE T_DOOR SET sch_doorgrp_id = NULL , updated_at = NOW(6) WHERE sch_doorgrp_id = #{schDoorgrpId}
mapper.select:
SELECT TW.id , TW.workplace_nm FROM T_WORKPLACE TW WHERE 1=1
AND TW.id = #{id}

SELECT TT.id , TT.terminal_cd , TT.terminal_typ , TT.door_id , TT.mgmt_num , TT.ip_addr , TT.complex_auth_typ , TT.face_auth_typ , TT.op_mode_typ , TT.online_yn FROM T_TERMINAL TT WHERE 1 = 1 AND TT.use_yn = 'Y'

SELECT TM.id as id, TD.door_nm as doorNm, TM.mgmt_num as mgmtNum, TM.terminal_cd as terminalCd, TM.terminal_typ as terminalTyp, (SELECT cd_nm FROM T_CMMN_CD WHERE cd_typ = 'TerminalTyp' AND cd = TM.terminal_typ) AS terminalTypNm, TM.ip_addr as ipAddr, TM.complex_auth_typ as complexAuthTyp, (SELECT cd_nm FROM T_CMMN_CD WHERE cd_typ = 'ComplexAuthTyp' AND cd = TM.complex_auth_typ) AS complexAuthTypNm, TM.face_auth_typ as faceAuthTyp, (SELECT cd_nm FROM T_CMMN_CD WHERE cd_typ = 'FaceAuthTyp' AND cd = TM.face_auth_typ) AS faceAuthTypNm, TM.use_yn as useYn FROM T_TERMINAL TM LEFT OUTER JOIN T_DOOR TD ON TM.door_id = TD.id WHERE 1=1
AND (TM.door_id is null or TM.door_id ='')
AND (TM.model_nm like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') OR TM.terminal_cd like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') OR TM.mgmt_num like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%'))
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_AREA ( building_id , area_nm , created_at , updated_at) VALUES ( #{buildingId} , #{areaNm} , NOW(6) , NOW(6) )
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(TT.door_id) AS useCnt FROM T_TERMINAL TT WHERE 1=1 AND TT.id = #{id} AND TT.use_yn = 'Y'
SELECT COUNT(TB.id) AS vCnt FROM T_BUILDING TB WHERE 1 = 1 AND replace(TB.building_nm, ' ', '') = replace(#{buildingNm}, ' ', '')
SELECT COUNT(TA.id) AS vCnt FROM T_AREA TA WHERE 1 = 1 AND replace(TA.area_nm, ' ', '') = replace(#{areaNm}, ' ', '')
SELECT COUNT(TF.id) AS vCnt FROM T_FLOOR TF WHERE 1 = 1 AND replace(TF.floor_nm, ' ', '') = replace(#{floorNm}, ' ', '')
SELECT COUNT(TD.id) AS vCnt FROM T_DOOR TD WHERE 1 = 1 AND replace(TD.door_nm, ' ', '') = replace(#{doorNm}, ' ', '')
SELECT COUNT(TT.id) AS cCnt FROM T_TERMINAL TT WHERE 1 = 1 AND TT.door_id = #{doorId}
SELECT id AS terminalId FROM T_TERMINAL TT WHERE 1 = 1 AND TT.terminal_cd = #{terminalCd}
